C

caseSensitive - Static variable in class com.zmicierk.webcrawler.WebCrawler
If true, the search will be case sensitive.
caseSensitive - Variable in class com.zmicierk.webcrawler.WebCrawlerThread
Defines the search method: 0x80 (Pattern.CANON_EQ) - Case sensitive 0x02 (Pattern.CASE_INSENSITIVE) - Case insensitive
checkFilePerm(String) - Method in class com.zmicierk.webcrawler.WebCrawlerThread
Checks if the file passed as a parameter can be written to.
checkFilesContext(String, String) - Static method in class com.zmicierk.webcrawler.WebCrawlerTest
The function compares the files passed as parameters, if the files do not match throws IOException.
com.zmicierk.webcrawler - package com.zmicierk.webcrawler
This package implements a web crawler.
compareTo(CSVTable) - Method in class com.zmicierk.webcrawler.CSVTable
Compares this object with the specified object for order.
copyFile(String, String) - Static method in class com.zmicierk.webcrawler.WebCrawlerTest
Copies the file from sourceFilePatch to destFilePatch.
countMatch(String) - Method in class com.zmicierk.webcrawler.WebCrawlerThread
This method searches for the specified terms on the page located at the passed url, passes the search results to the printToCSV method, and adds links from this page to the UrlQuaFormed if they are not contained in UrlArray, UrlQuaFormed and UrlQuaCur.
countMatchTest() - Method in class com.zmicierk.webcrawler.WebCrawlerTest
Checking the correctness of the operation of the prepareCSV, openRawCSV, countMatch methods of the WebCrawler class.
CSVTable - Class in com.zmicierk.webcrawler
The class is designed to work with a csv string (summarize occurrences, perform sorting) An instance of this class is a string, consisting of url address and the number of occurrences of terms on the page, located at this address.
CSVTable(String) - Constructor for class com.zmicierk.webcrawler.CSVTable
Parses the input string into url and the number of occurrences, and calculates the sum of the occurrences.
